Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.Match
All Implemented Interfaces:
Communicator
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiMatch, SingleMatch
public abstract class Match extends Object implements Communicator
This class implements the Match functionalities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Match()
    Constructor, builds the common parts to MultiMatch and SingleMatch (matchConfiguration, Market and LeaderStack) from a json file

    Custom constructor, for initializing a match after a custom configuration creation.
